spec_data.Name: mona-vlgothic-fonts
spec_data.Description:
Mona Font is a Japanese proportional font which allows you to view
Japanese text arts correctly.

This package contains True Type fonts generated generated from
monafont source package which are based on VLGothic fonts.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Sat 25 Feb 2017 07:58:44 PM EST, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: True Type Japanese font for text arts based on VLGothic
